overview: Cold night, warm cabins...and steaming young pussies! Welcome to Barely Legal Ski Camp, where the hottest legal teens spend the winter. Cuddle up next to the fire with seven of the yummiest ski bunnies. Watch fresh girls strip off their snowsuits to expose hot skin. These teenage cuties are horny for ski studs who use their poles on and off the slopes!
title: Barely Legal Ski Camp
